s0006: After Ruyi was established as Zhao king, he nearly replaced the crown prince several times, but relied on ministers contending for him, and the Marquis of Liu's strategy, so the crown prince was not deposed.
s0196: Ordered his son Ji to go and deceive and persuade Lu Lu saying: 'The High Emperor and Empress Lu jointly pacified the realm, the Liu clan established nine kings, the Lu clan established three kings, all were ministers' discussions, the matters have already been announced to the feudal lords, the feudal lords all considered it appropriate.
s0269: There were ten heralds holding halberds guarding the palace gate, saying: 'The Son of Heaven is here, why are you entering?'
s0276: The Grand Historian says: During the time of Emperor Hui and Empress Gao, the common people got to leave the suffering of the Warring States, lords and ministers all wished to rest in non-action, therefore Emperor Hui hung up his sleeves in waiting, Empress Gao as female ruler issued decrees, government did not leave the inner chambers, the realm was peaceful.
